name: SearchPlus
author: Soundex Ltd.

sections.description:
Search+ enchances your serch box, making it more convenient and easy to use.

Major features in Search+ include:

  • Voice recognition
  • Type ahead
  • Did you mean?
  • Transliteration
  • Usage statistics
  • Voice navigator (experimental)
  • Jump links (experimental)

Once the plugin is activated, you will have to go to the Search+ configuration page (from the left menu) and complete the account creation – it takes a single click!

A step by step guide is available at our wiki.
sections.installation:
Obtain the SearchPlus plugin, activate it and then register or link your existing registration to the current site with a single click.

Extensive configuration options are available at your account’s settings section
in the customer portal of the service.

More information is available in our wiki.
sections.faq:
I just want to get the microphone for free. Is there a way?

Sure, by default the service uses a free plan, which gives you the most popular feature – the microphone (voice recognition).

What are the experimental features?

They are generally available, but the access to them is restricted since we are still running usability and user acceptance tests.
sections.changelog:
1.5

Updates, related to the account reset

1.4

Structural updates and further improvement of the account functions.

1.3

  • Updated some account funtions

1.2

  • Removed instructions, related to positioning engine v1

1.1

  • Updated the registration process. Now it is a single-click operation!

1.0

  • Release Date – 7 October 2022
  • The first official version.

For older changelog entries, please see the additional changelog.txt file delivered with the plugin.
